item.title: Call Overseas For Pennies From Your Cell Phone
item.description: With cell phones now serving as both personal and business lines, affordable landline long distance isn’t very useful. The real desire is for better rates on mobile phones. Considering you already have domestic calling and internet, the missing piece is inexpensive international calling. TEL3 recognized this trend and developed their TEL3Advantage service for mobile users in the US and Canada. Many people need to call contacts internationally, but affordable mobile options have been limited until now.

item.title: Call China From Your Car
item.description: Imagine needing to make an international call while away from home. With the TEL3 app, you can call internationally from your cell phone for incredibly low rates, like a penny per minute to China. You might be wondering if international calls can be cheaper on a cell phone than a landline. With the right service, they absolutely can be. TEL3Advantage is an add-on service that lets you make inexpensive international calls from any phone.
